test_cases.issue_description: Unlimited plan customers receive false data limit warnings due to SMS alert system not updating after plan change
test_cases.test_scenario: Test plan change from limited to unlimited and verify SMS alert system updates correctly
preconditions: Customer has a limited data plan with SMS alerts enabled
Customer changes to an unlimited data plan
test_steps: Step 1: Change customer's plan from limited to unlimited
Step 2: Verify SMS alert system is updated to reflect unlimited plan
Step 3: Check if customer receives false data limit warnings
test_cases.expected_result: SMS alert system updates correctly to reflect unlimited plan and customer does not receive false data limit warnings
test_cases.actual_issue: SMS alert system does not update automatically when customer changes to unlimited plan, causing false data limit warnings
edge_cases: Test with different types of limited plans
Test with multiple plan changes in a short period
test_cases.customer_impact: Unlimited customers receive unnecessary stress and may restrict their data usage due to false warnings

test_cases.issue_description: SMS commands listed in HELP menu are not functional
test_cases.test_scenario: Verify that all SMS commands listed in HELP menu are functional and return correct responses
preconditions: Setup SMS service with a test account
Send HELP command to retrieve list of available commands
test_steps: Step 1: Send each command listed in HELP menu response
Step 2: Verify response for each command
test_cases.expected_result: All SMS commands listed in HELP menu return correct responses without 'invalid command' errors
test_cases.actual_issue: Some SMS commands listed in HELP menu return 'invalid command' errors
test_cases.customer_impact: Customer expectations not met, time wasted due to misleading HELP menu
